title: Rounded Bar Plots
text: two types bar charts ggplot2: geom_bar() geom_col(). geom_bar_rounded() geom_col_rounded() wrappers rounding top corners. geom_bar_rounded() makes height bar proportional number cases group (weight aesthetic supplied, sum weights).  want heights bars represent values data, use geom_col_rounded() instead.
code: library(ggrounded) library(ggplot2)  ggplot(mpg, aes(class)) +   geom_bar_rounded() ggplot(data.frame(x = letters[1:3], y = c(2.3, 1.9, 3.2)), aes(x, y)) +   geom_col_rounded()

text: Create bar plot rounded corners using 'ggplot2'. geom_col_rounded() geom_bar_rounded() extensions ggplot2::geom_col() ggplot2::geom_bar() functions provide additional aesthetics visually appealing outputs.

title: Bar plot with rounded corners — geom_bar_rounded
code: geom_bar_rounded(   mapping = NULL,   data = NULL,   position = ggplot2::position_stack(reverse = TRUE),   radius = grid::unit(4, "pt"),   ...,   width = NULL,   na.rm = FALSE,   show.legend = NA,   inherit.aes = TRUE )  geom_col_rounded(   mapping = NULL,   data = NULL,   position = ggplot2::position_stack(reverse = TRUE),   radius = grid::unit(4, "pt"),   ...,   width = NULL,   na.rm = FALSE,   show.legend = NA,   inherit.aes = TRUE )
